# ion-item-divider

Item Divider is divider component for list items.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

#### color

string

The color to use for the item-divider


#### mode

string

The mode determines which platform styles to use.
Possible values are: `"ios"` or `"md"`.


## Attributes

#### color

string

The color to use for the item-divider


#### mode

string

The mode determines which platform styles to use.
Possible values are: `"ios"` or `"md"`.
